name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Dynamic Full-Stack Developer with a robust proficiency in **Java**, **JavaScript**, and **TypeScript**, developing scalable microservices and REST APIs for seamless application integration. Expert in **React.js** for dynamic frontend development, coupled with strong backend capabilities using **Java** and **Spring Boot**. Skilled in deploying applications on **AWS** services including **Lambda**, **EC2**, **S3**, and **RDS**, with a commitment to **Clean Code** practices and automated testing. Proven ability to enhance user experience in diverse industries such as healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, leveraging Agile methodologies like **Scrum** and continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) strategies. Notable strengths include meticulous documentation, ensuring security best practices, and effective use of tools like **Git** and **Apache Wicket**.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed microservices-based applications utilizing **Java** (Spring Boot), ensuring a seamless integration of backend services and achieving a **95% accuracy** in patient tracking.
• Created **RESTful APIs** with **Spring Data JPA**, enhancing data integrity by **40%** while implementing **Spring Security** and **OAuth2** for secure Electronic Health Record (EHR) management.
• Enhanced UI/UX using **React.js** and Ant Design, resulting in a **30% reduction** in user task completion times.
• Implemented a real-time notification system with **RabbitMQ**, achieving **99% timely alert delivery** to users.
• Established CI/CD pipelines through **GitHub Actions** and **AWS CodePipeline**, decreasing deployment time by **80%** to increase development efficiency.
• Containerized applications using **Docker**, facilitating consistent deployment practices across both staging and production environments.
• Managed services on **AWS EKS** (Kubernetes) with **Terraform**, achieving a **99.9% uptime** and optimizing application performance through **Redis** caching strategies.

• Developed full-stack applications utilizing **Java** (Spring Boot) and **JavaScript** (Node.js), enhancing backend performance and reducing response times for ticketing and customer support by **25%**.
• Designed and implemented microservices architecture with **REST APIs** for efficient data communication across applications.
• Created a robust notification system with **Kafka** for real-time alerts, achieving a **98%** timely notification rate for critical issues.
• Developed a customer insights dashboard using **Vue.js** and **D3.js**, boosting resolution rates by **20%**.
• Automated testing and deployment processes with **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, ensuring a consistent and efficient release pipeline.
• Deployed applications on **AWS EC2** and managed infrastructure with **Docker** and **Terraform**, reducing infrastructure setup time by **50%**.
• Collaborated within Agile teams, embracing **Scrum** methodologies to ensure effective project delivery and continuous improvement.
• Followed Clean Code principles and maintained thorough documentation to support sustainable coding practices.
• Ensured application security and compliance while utilizing tools like **AWS Lambda**, **S3**, and **RDS** for data management.

Utilized **Java** and **JavaScript** to develop robust backend REST APIs using **Spring Boot** and **Hibernate**, achieving **98%** uptime.
Implemented the frontend with **React.js** and **TypeScript**, significantly improving load times by **40%**.
Employed **AWS** services, including **Lambda**, **EC2**, and **S3**, for scalable and efficient deployment, ensuring global low-latency access.
Led testing initiatives using **JUnit** and **Mockito**, reducing bugs by **30%** through automated testing practices.
Applied **microservices** architecture principles to enhance system modularity and maintainability.
Developed user interfaces with **HTML**, **CSS**, and **SCSS**, ensuring a responsive design across devices.
Managed code versioning with **Git** and streamlined deployment processes via **CI/CD** strategies.
Engaged in Agile and Scrum methodologies to foster teamwork and enhance project delivery.
Ensured adherence to Clean Code principles for maintainable software solutions.

skills:
